## Goal of the lecture

1. Introduce the ideas behind the what is being called the Internet of Things from a historical context.
2. Demo: Use the `deep_translator` engine to do Speech processing
3. Demo: Use a social machine to control a physical entity 
4. Automated email with any data such as text, audio files and images to selected attendees using the Raspberry Pi.
